original_info.name: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mr. B's Lost Shorts

review.name: If you like Mystery Science Theater you'll love this...
review.reviewBody: Anyone who watches mystery science theater will know what the shorts are all about. Here is an hour and a half of the worst(best for mst3k) ever. If you dont know mst3k but you like monty python or making fun of bad movies you should also get this. B movies have never been so fun! God bless mst3k
